atricle_title: The process of how I design Logos
html: let us first skip the part where designers & infuluencers  explain how logo’s are so impotent for brands to create identtity and have their name noticed 🤤, if weren’t so, egyptiants wouldn’t pay attention on creating their sign of existence till now and for ever.  let me remind you with this quet “*people cannot read French or English — but are great in remembering signs*” - Karl Lagerfeld.       now after we all agreed lets follow these creative stages of me being perfect hahaha
